description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Philippi Caurianæ De obsidione Rupellæ commentarius. Histoire du siège de la Rochelle en 1573, traduite du latin de Philippe Cauriana. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
